title: Is it possible to hack NASA satellites? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes ,It is possible to Hack the satellite . Few steps need to follow . Single-person cannot achieve this task . require group and skills to match in group .Math-logic-algorithm-design-Track-Uplink-Downlink-System are Required to hack the satellite.Satellite stations are designed and secured in few places . To Hack the Satellite you need the Uplink and Downlink from the Satellite station .Satellite can Be hacked by telecommunications Like T.V channels stations .Group Should be fast enough to beat the satellite algorithm .Time will be less than 12 minutes for Tracking You .Achieve task by satellite station by secure lines will be easy
